remarks: Restricted existential quantification over the range of a function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Dec-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2014.)
statement:
rexrn.1 $e |- ( x = ( F ` y ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
rexrn $p |- ( F Fn A -> ( E. x e. ran F ph <-> E. y e. A ps ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
